CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 20, 1952, p. 10, reads: "THE JUNIOR LEAGUERS ARE INSTALLED - Pittsburgh's Junior League Club was formerly installed last Saturday night at the home of member Bootsie Bray, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. LuGene Bray. After the candlelight service, a dancing party ensued.  Pictured here with their co-sponsors, Mrs. Mary McEnheimer and Mrs. Toki Schalk Johnson, are twelve of the present thirteen members.  Shown here, seated front, Joanne Vanderhoop, Beverly Butler, Joyce Robinson and Bootsie Bray. Rear: Marva Hord, Sylvia Knott, Kay Stokes, Gay Cyrus, Sarah Burney, Carol Jones, Joan Hopson and Roberta Ratcliff. In right, rear, are co-sponsors Toki Schalk Johnson and Mary McEnheimer.  Arriving later was Betsey Johnson, the thirteenth member. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Junior League Club, including seated on floor: Joanne Vanderhoop, Beverly Butler, Joyce Robinson, LouJeanne "Bootsie" Bray; Marva Hord wearing dark bow at neck on left, back row: Sylvia Knott, Kay Stokes, Gay Cyrus, Sarah Burney, Carol Jones, Joan Hopson, Roberta Ratcliff; and co-sponsors Toki Schalk Johnson and Mary McEnheimer standing near doorway, possibly in Bray home with top hat and gloves design on floor
